segments.text: Don't tell me that's your lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , this is just my appetizer ... this is my lunch !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A candy bar for an appetizer and a piece of pie for lunch ! That's all junk !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is good food , it has milk , fruit , grains , nuts ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sugar , sugar , preservatives , fats , more sugar , more fat , more preservatives !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At least I enjoy my lunch ! What's in your bag ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My wife sent me with rice , vegetables , and some curry chicken .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's the difference , your wife made it ! I have to make my own lunch !
segments.speaker: S2
